entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Documentation how to release macOS catalyst apps on App Store #12455
  • [WinUI] NullReferenceException on startup when using UseMauiCompatibility() + Prism #12454
  • ScrollView Inside StackLayout Not Working in MAUI #12452
  • CollectionView Items display issue when Header is resized on iOS #12429
    Backlog
  • Label Autofit Font #12428
    Backlog
  • Android enterprise - work profile - app crash, no possibility to run and debug #12427
  • Android Release build - slow and ends with errors, blocker from xamarin migration #12426
  • CarouselView position is not correct on iOS when ItemsSource contains only 1 item #12425
    Backlog
  • Input in Entry filed with Keyboard="Numeric" does not accept "," input #12424
    Backlog
  • Culture settings not working in timepicker #12423
    Backlog

Closed

  • [Mac] Can I open mac window with fullScreen #7778
    Backlog
  • AppCenter still does dot build MAUI apps .... #12336
  • Azure Pipelines Ios Maui: code object is not signed at all #12430
  • WebView2 stops receiving click events if you type and switch focus fast enough. #12361
  • MAUI .net 7.0 , App store submission failed bitcode issue December 2022 #12331
  • [iOS]Additional space between FlyoutHeader and FlyoutItem in Shell page #12329
  • iOS Bundle Resources value not found for GoogleServiceInfo.plist in .net MAUI #12333
  • [Bug] iOS Border with RoundedRectangle StrokeShape doesn't clip content #12414
  • There is a problem #12334
  • HeadContent not working with maui with blazor #12338
  • Setting 'CanExecute' doesn't change the status of Button controls when they are bound to MVVM Commands #9753
    Backlog
  • MediaPicker.CapturePhotoAsync generates "Attempt to invoke virtual method 'boolean android.view.View.isInLayout()' on a null object reference" #12275

PullRequests

Created

  • Unseal some Microsoft.Maui.Controls classes #12451
    area/architecture, community ✨
  • [net7.0] Update Essentials Gyroscope API Docs #12448
    area/docs 📓
  • Ensure image creation on any thread #12418
    area/drawing ✏️

Merged

  • [net7.0] Update Essentials FilePicker API Docs #12444
    area/docs 📓
  • [net7.0] Update Essentials HapticFeedback API Docs #12443
    area/docs 📓
  • [net7.0] Set windows placeholder vertical text alignment #12440
    area/controls 🎮
  • [net7.0] Update Essentials MagnetoMeter API Docs #12439
    area/docs 📓
  • [net7.0] Update Essentials Email API Docs #12438
    area/docs 📓
  • [net7.0] Update Essentials Geolocation API Docs #12437
    area/docs 📓
  • [net7.0] Update Essentials FileSystem API Docs #12436
    area/docs 📓
  • [net7.0] [Tizen] Add requesting re-layout step #12435
    area/layout 🔲
  • [net6.0] [Tizen] Add requesting re-layout step #12434
    area/layout 🔲
  • [net7.0] Update Essentials Launcher API Docs #12433
    area/docs 📓
  • [net7.0] Set bottom margin back to zero when removing Bottom Tabs #12441
  • [net7.0] Remove Android LaunchAdjacent flag for Essentials #12432
    area/essentials 🍞
  • [net7.0] Reconcile PointerOver, Pressed, and Focused states #12431
    area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [net7.0] Improve design type converters #12442
  • [Android] Fix crash in SwipeView collapsing ListView groups #8651
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮
  • Bump xunit from 2.4.1 to 2.4.2 #9214
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [net7.0] Update Essentials Geocoding Docs #12445
    area/docs 📓
  • Update to stable version branding #12453
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net6.0] Improve design type converters #12450
  • [net7.0] Use the UpdateHasContainer method everywhere #12447
  • [net7.0] Bump Microsoft.WindowsAppSDK from 1.2.221116.1 to 1.2.221209.1 #12446
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net7.0] Add missing await call for color match test #12449
    area/testing

Updated

  • Updating Windows App SDK version to 1.1.4 #12456
    community ✨
  • Fix timing on iOS Toolbar #12363
    area/shell 🐢, area/toolbar
  • Resolve some life cycle issues with `TabbedPage` when nested inside a `NavigationPage` #11530
    platform/android 🤖, area/navigation 🧭, area/TabbedPage
  • Fix initial page and back button Navigation events #12348
    area/navigation 🧭
  • [Essentials] add Bluetooth permissions #12413
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Make MAUI into 1 workload and lots of NuGets instead of a full workload #11206
    area/setup 🪄
  • Feat: Added "Keyboard.None" #11024
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • [iOS] Fix Entry Next Keyboard Button Finds Next TextField #11914
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, .NET 7 + Servicing
